name: Robo.to Widget
author: Ian Dundas

sections.description:
A widget showing your latest video status uploaded to your http://Robo.to wall. Simple!

All you need is to find your UUID code from your Robo.to account, paste it in within wp-admin widget settings, and you’re sorted!

For a demo, see this site: http://b.id8.eu/
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload roboto.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Done!
sections.faq:
How can I report a bug?

You can contact me at karma.slap+roboto@gmail.com
